mapper.select: select * from ( select * from evoltb_identity_user where identity_symbol_ & 4 > 0 and del_status_ = 'ACTIVE' ) as t1 left join ( select iur.user_id_, group_concat(ir.role_name_) as role_name_, group_concat(ir.id_) as role_id_ from evoltb_identity_user_role iur, evoltb_identity_role ir where iur.role_id_ = ir.id_ group by iur.user_id_ ) as t2 on t1.id_ = t2.user_id_
